dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, big news coming out of Almaty. Rescue services have issued a pretty serious warning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, big news coming out of Almaty. Rescue services have issued a pretty serious warning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescue services have issued a warning to Almaty residents due to extreme heat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? What's going on? Is it, like, the weather?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? What's going on? Is it, like, the weather?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly. Extreme heat. We're talking like, 35 to 39 degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly. Extreme heat. We're talking like, thirty five to thirty nine degrees Celsius.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Almaty™s Emergency Situations Department (DES), abnormally high temperatures ranging from 35ÂC to 39ÂC are forecasted in the city from June 17 to 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, 39? That's, um, that's really hot. For how long?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, thirty nine? That's, um, that's really hot. For how long?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: From the 17th to the 19th of June, apparently. Almaty's Emergency Situations Department put it out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From the seventeenth to the nineteenth of June, apparently. Almaty's Emergency Situations Department put it out.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Almaty™s Emergency Situations Department (DES), abnormally high temperatures ranging from 35ÂC to 39ÂC are forecasted in the city from June 17 to 19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And did Kazhydromet also, uh, say anything about that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And did Kazhydromet also, uh, say anything about that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, actually. They issued a storm warning in connection with it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, actually. They issued a storm warning in connection with it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In connection with this, Kazhydromet has issued a storm warning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A storm warning *for* heat? That's, uh, interesting. So, safety precautions, obviously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A storm warning for heat? That's, uh, interesting. So, safety precautions, obviously?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. They're really urging residents to follow them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. They're really urging residents to follow them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Emergency services urge residents to follow these safety precautions during the heatwave:

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And, speaking of Kazhydromet, I also saw their broader forecast for June 2025 for Kazakhstan. Sounds pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, speaking of Kazhydromet, I also saw their broader forecast for June twenty twenty five for Kazakhstan. Sounds pretty wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, Kazhydromet meteorologists released the weather forecast for June 2025 in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right! The whole month, not just the heatwave. What's the, um, the overall vibe?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right! The whole month, not just the heatwave. What's the, um, the overall vibe?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unstable, for sure. They're predicting like, alternating cool and hot spells.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unstable, for sure. They're predicting like, alternating cool and hot spells.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month " alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Oh, so not just consistently hot then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, so not just consistently hot then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. And then also rain, sometimes heavy, thunderstorms...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. And then also rain, sometimes heavy, thunderstorms...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month " alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And hail, too, right? I remember seeing hail and squally winds.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And hail, too, right? I remember seeing hail and squally winds.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month " alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, and on some days, um, dust storms are even possible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, and on some days, um, dust storms are even possible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On some days, dust storms are also possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, uh, pretty much everything but snow, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, uh, pretty much everything but snow, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Pretty much! So, residents across Kazakhstan, you know, just be ready for anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! So, residents across Kazakhstan, you know, just be ready for anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, keep those weather apps handy, folks.
